snippet.title: Amstrad CPC -=The Shadows of Sergoth=-
snippet.description:
Amstrad CPC -=The Shadows of Sergoth=-
***
The Shadows of Sergoth is a dungeon crawler in subjective view for Amstrad CPC. It works on any CPC model equipped with 128KB RAM. 

Story: Ced, Kukulcan
Programming: Chris94, Kukulcan
Graphics: Chris94, Ced
Musics: John McKLain, Rayxamber, Tom&Jerry/GPA

Source: http://www.cpc-power.com/index.php?page=detail&num=14747
Download: http://www.cpc-power.com/TSOS_UK.zip
